p: All reagents, unless otherwise specified, were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Saint Louis, MO, USA). Essential oil of Melaleuca alternifolia (TTO) used for the experiment was provided by APACT (Forl√¨, FC, Italy). For the experiment, the TTO was reconstituted in 0.5% dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO) and Tween 80 (0.002%) [ 14]. Terpinen-4-ol was purchased by Moellhausen (Vimercate, MB, Italy).
